select wtype_num,e.emp_num,emp_name,work_num,work_sdate,work_edate,work_content,work_state, decode(wtype_num, 1,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), 2,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), 3,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')||'T'||to_char(work_edate,'hh24:mi'), 4,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')||'T'||to_char(work_edate,'hh24:mi'), 5,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), 6,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') )"sdate", decode(wtype_num, 1,to_char(work_edate+1,'yyyy-mm-dd'), 5,to_char(work_edate+1,'yyyy-mm-dd'), 6,to_char(work_edate+1,'yyyy-mm-dd') )"edate", decode(wtype_num, 1,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||' ~ '||to_char(work_edate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||'
연차
'||work_content, 2,decode(to_char(work_edate,'hh24'), 11,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||'
반차(오전)
'||work_content, 12,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||'
반차(오후)
'||work_content), 3,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||' '||to_char(work_edate,'hh24:mi')||'
지각
'||work_content, 4,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||' '||to_char(work_edate,'hh24:mi')||'
야근
'||work_content, 5,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||' ~ '||to_char(work_edate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||'
외근
'||work_content, 6,to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||' ~ '||to_char(work_edate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||'
경조사,기타
'||work_content )"content" from work w,employee e where w.emp_num=e.emp_num and work_state in (1,86) and e.emp_num in(select emp_num from employee where dept_num=(select dept_num from employee where emp_num=#{emp_num}))

select distinct work_num,dept_name, emp_name, to_char( to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||' ~ '||to_char(work_edate,'yyyy/mm/dd') )"term", wtype_num,work_content, decode(wtype_num, 1,'연차', 5,'외근/출장/교육', 6,'경조사/기타' )"wtype_name" from work w,worklist wl, employee e, dept d where w.emp_num=e.emp_num and wl.emp_num=e.emp_num and d.dept_num=e.dept_num and work_state=1 and w.wtype_num in (1,5,6) and e.emp_num in (select emp_num from employee where dept_num=(select dept_num from employee where emp_num=#{emp_num})) and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') between to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') and to_char(work_edate,'yyyy/mm/dd') )

select distinct work_num,dept_name, emp_name,to_char(to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')||' - '||to_char( decode(wtype_num, 2, decode(to_char(work_edate,'hh24'), 11,'오전', 12,'오후' ), 3,to_char(work_edate,'hh24:mi'), 4,to_char(work_edate,'hh24:mi') ) ))"term", wtype_num,work_content, decode(wtype_num, 2, decode(to_char(work_edate,'hh24'), 11,'오전반차', 12,'오후반차' ), 3,'지각', 4,'야근' )"wtype_name" from work w,worklist wl, employee e, dept d where w.emp_num=e.emp_num and wl.emp_num=e.emp_num and d.dept_num=e.dept_num and work_state=1 and w.wtype_num in (2,3,4) and e.emp_num in (select emp_num from employee where dept_num=(select dept_num from employee where emp_num=#{emp_num})) and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') between to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') and to_char(work_sdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') )
